Html:
Hi, I'm wondering if it is possible to modify an already existing excel file (ms office 2k3 format)?

Basically I would need to select a specific sheet, see at what row the last entry was placed and then place new entries after that row.

Hopefully this is possible, but I have my doubts..
It is currently not possible to read Excel 2003 files. If you want to achieve the same with Excel 2007, this is possible.
If you are on a Windows box, you can use COM objects. If you are on *nix, the only way I can think of is some type of bridge through java to use the OpenOffice libraries or a 3rd Party component.
